name: Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown
The Boy Who Could Fly
tagline: An autistic boy who dreams of flying touches everyone he meets, including a new family who has moved in after their father dies.

name: The Orphanage

production.name: Esta Vivo! Laboratorio de Nuevos Talentos
Rodar y Rodar Cine y Televisión

tagline: A woman brings her family back to her childhood home, which used to be an orphanage for handicapped children. Before long, her son starts to communicate with an invisible new friend.

name: The Hoax
tagline: In what would cause a fantastic media frenzy, Clifford Irving sells his bogus biography of Howard Hughes to a premiere publishing house in the early 1970s.

name: American Dreamz
tagline: The new season of "American Dreamz," the wildly popular television singing contest, has captured the country's attention, as the competition looks to be between a young Midwestern gal (Moore) and a showtunes-loving young man from Orange County (Golzari). Recently awakened President Staton (Quaid) even wants in on the craze, as he signs up for the potential explosive season finale.

name: She's Gotta Have It
tagline: Story of a woman and her three lovers.

name: A Separation
tagline: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

name: Before the Devil Knows You're Dead
tagline: When two brothers organize the robbery of their parents' jewelry store the job goes horribly wrong, triggering a series of events that sends them, their father and one brother's wife hurtling towards a shattering climax.

name: How She Move
tagline: Following her sister's death from drug addiction, a high school student is forced to leave her private school to return to her old, crime-filled neighborhood where she re-kindles an unlikely passion for the competitive world of step dancing.

name: Dear God
tagline: When letters written to God start getting results, and replies, people everywhere are amazed. The Post Office however is annoyed.

name: Quills
tagline: In a Napoleonic era insane asylum, an inmate, the irrepressible Marquis De Sade, fights a battle of wills against a tyrannically prudish doctor.

name: Phat Girlz
tagline: Two plus-sized ladies meet the men of their dreams in the most unexpected of ways.

name: Pride

production.name: Cinered Internationale Filmproduktionsgesellschaft mbH & Co. 1. Beteiligungs KG

tagline: The determined Jim Ellis starts a swim team for troubled teens at the Philadelphia Department of Recreation.

name: Turistas
tagline: A group of young backpackers' vacation turns sour when a bus accident leaves them marooned in a remote Brazilian rural area that holds an ominous secret.

name: Three Wishes
tagline: In an unexplained act of charity, Jeanne Holman, picks up an injured, apparent tramp and takes him home to care for him little realising who he was or the effect he would have on her life and those of her family.

name: Kissing Jessica Stein
tagline: A woman searching for the perfect man instead discovers the perfect woman.

name: Black Nativity
tagline: A street-wise teen from Baltimore who has been raised by a single mother travels to New York City to spend the Christmas holiday with his estranged relatives, where he embarks on a surprising and inspirational journey.

name: Bug
tagline: An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.

name: The Triplets of Belleville
tagline: When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

name: An American Carol
tagline: An anti-American filmmaker who's out to abolish the July Fourth holiday is visited by three ghosts who try to change his perception of the country.

name: Raise the Titanic
tagline: To obtain a supply of a rare mineral, a ship raising operation is conducted for the only known source, the Titanic.

name: Buena Vista Social Club

production.name: Instituto Cubano del Arte e Industrias Cinematográficos (ICAIC)

tagline: Aging Cuban musicians whose talents had been virtually forgotten following Castro's takeover of Cuba, are brought out of retirement by Ry Cooder, who travelled to Havana in order to bring the musicians together, resulting in triumphant performances of extraordinary music, and resurrecting the musicians' careers.

name: Fearless
tagline: A man's personality is dramatically changed after surviving a major airline crash.

name: Relentless
tagline: Two Los Angeles police detectives, cynical veteran Malloy and cocky rookie Dietz, hunt for a serial killer, an ex-cop named Taylor, whom randomly chooses his victims from a phone directory.

name: Screwed
tagline: A chauffeur kidnaps his rich boss's dog to hold it for ransom, but when she accidentally gets the dog back, she thinks that it's the chauffeur who's been kidnapped.

name: Children of the Corn II: The Final Sacrifice
tagline: A journalist and his son travel to Nebraska to investigate the mysterious town of Gaitlin where, unbeknownst to them, a murderous cult of children are waiting in the corn fields.

name: Trial by Jury
tagline: Valerie is a juror in the trail of a mob boss. When her young son's life is threatened, she has no option other than to see that justice isn't done.

name: House Arrest
tagline: A group of children, desperate to keep their various parents from getting divorces, kidnap them and hold them prisoner in a basement in order to force them to reconcile.

name: I Ought to Be in Pictures
Shag
tagline: Summer of 1963. Carson is getting married to her boyfriend so her friends Melaina, Pudge and Luanne take her to Myrtle Beach for one last irresponsible weekend.

name: The Girl Who Played with Fire
tagline: As computer hacker Lisbeth and journalist Mikael investigate a sex-trafficking ring, Lisbeth is accused of three murders, causing her to go on the run while Mikael works to clear her name.

name: Sexy Beast
tagline: Brutal gangster Don Logan recruits "retired" safecracker Gal for one last job, but it goes badly for both of them.

name: BASEketball
tagline: Two childhood friends are pro athletes of a national sport called BASEketball, a hybrid of baseball and basketball, and must deal with a greedy businessman scheming against their team.

name: The Wedding Banquet
tagline: To satisfy his nagging parents, a gay landlord and a female tenant agree to a marriage of convenience, but his parents arrive to visit and things get out of hand.

name: Take Me Home Tonight
tagline: Four years after graduation, an awkward high school genius uses his sister's boyfriend's Labor Day party as the perfect opportunity to make his move on his high school crush.

name: State and Main
tagline: A movie crew invades a small town whose residents are all too ready to give up their values for showbiz glitz.

name: Trapped
tagline: When their daughter is kidnapped by experienced nappers, the Jennings' turn the tables on this seemingly foolproof plan.

name: A Cry in the Dark
tagline: A mother, whose child was killed in a Dingo attack in outback Northern Territory, Australia, fights to prove her innocence.

name: Poltergeist
tagline: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.

name: Death Wish 4: The Crackdown
tagline: Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey takes on the members of a vicious Los Angeles drug cartel to stop the flow of drugs after his girlfriend's daughter dies from an overdose.

name: Woman Thou Art Loosed
tagline: An adaptation of Bishop T.D. Jakes' self-help novel, chronciling a woman's struggle to come to terms with her legacy of abuse, addiction and poverty.

name: Redline
tagline: A gorgeous young automobile fanatic--and front to the hottest unsigned band on the West coast--finds herself caught up in illegal drag-racing competitions organized by exotic car fanatics.

name: Cedar Rapids
tagline: Tim Lippe has no idea what he's in for when he's sent to Cedar Rapids, Iowa to represent his company at an annual insurance convention, where he soon finds himself under the "guidance" of three convention veterans.

name: Incendies
tagline: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history, and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

name: Running Scared
tagline: A low-ranking thug is entrusted by his crime boss to dispose of a gun that killed corrupt cops, but things get out of control when the gun ends up in wrong hands.

name: Willard
tagline: A young man with an unusual connection with rats, uses them at his own sociopathic will.

name: The Spectacular Now
tagline: A hard-partying high school senior's philosophy on life changes when he meets the not-so-typical "nice girl."

name: 200 Cigarettes
tagline: A collection of twentysomethings try to cope with relationships, loneliness, desire and their individual neuroses.

name: The Collection
tagline: A man who escapes from the vicious grips of the serial killer known as "The Collector" is blackmailed to rescue an innocent girl from the killer's booby-trapped warehouse.

name: Panther
tagline: A dramatized account of the story of The Black Panther Party of Self-Defense.

name: Moonlight Mile
tagline: As he copes with the death of his fiancee along with her parents, a young man must figure out what he wants out of life.

name: The Chipmunk Adventure
tagline: The Chipmunks compete with the Chipettes in a round the world race.

name: Easter Parade
tagline: A nightclub performer hires a naive chorus girl to become his new dance partner to make his former partner jealous and to prove he can make any partner a star.

name: Breakin' 2: Electric Boogaloo
tagline: A developer tries to bulldoze a community recreation center. The local breakdancers try to stop it.

name: Mixed Nuts
tagline: The events focus around a crisis hotline business on one crazy night during the Christmas holidays.

name: Trick or Treat
tagline: Sammi Curr was a famous, devil-worshiping rock star who died under mysterious circumstances. Now he wants to come back to life. Doing so requires possessing radio wave & automobiles and making a few human sacrifices.

name: Conviction
tagline: A working mother puts herself through law school in an effort to represent her brother, who has been wrongfully convicted of murder and has exhausted his chances to appeal his conviction through public defenders.

name: In the Valley of Elah
tagline: A retired military investigator works with a police detective to uncover the truth behind his son's disappearance following his return from a tour of duty in Iraq.

name: Thunderbirds
tagline: When The Hood finds and invades International Rescue's secret base and traps most of the Tracy family, only young Alan Tracy and his friends can save the day.

name: Ladies in Lavender
tagline: Two sisters befriend a mysterious foreigner who washes up on the beach of their 1930's Cornish seaside village.

name: The Quiet Ones
tagline: A university professor and a team of students conduct an experiment on a young woman, uncovering terrifyingly dark, unexpected forces in the process.

name: The Forsaken
tagline: A young man gets embroiled in a war against vampires.

name: Running with Scissors
tagline: Young Augusten Burroughs absorbs experiences that could make for a shocking memoir: the son of an alcoholic father and an unstable mother, he's handed off to his mother's therapist, Dr. Finch, and spends his adolescent years as a member of Finch's bizarre extended family.

name: The Young Black Stallion
tagline: A young girl befriends a wild black stallion.

name: Amour
tagline: Georges and Anne are an octogenarian couple. They are cultivated, retired music teachers. Their daughter, also a musician, lives in Britain with her family. One day, Anne has a stroke, and the couple's bond of love is severely tested.

name: American History X
tagline: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

name: Swing Shift
tagline: A woman finds romance when she takes a job at an airport plant to help make ends meet after her husband goes off to war.

name: Mighty Aphrodite
tagline: When he discovers his adopted son is a genius, a New York sportswriter seeks out the boy's birth mother: a prostitute.

name: Delta Force 2: The Colombian Connection
tagline: When DEA agents are taken captive by a ruthless South American kingpin, the Delta Force is reunited to rescue them in this sequel to the 1986 film.

name: The Closet
tagline: A man spreads the rumor of his fake homosexuality with the aid of his neighbor, to prevent his imminent firing at his work.

name: Hairspray
tagline: A 'pleasantly plump' teenager teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

name: U Turn
tagline: A young punk drifter heading to Vegas to pay off his gambling debt before the Russian mafia kills him, is forced to stop in a Arizona town where everything that can go wrong, does go wrong for him.

name: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
tagline: As an asteroid nears Earth, a man finds himself alone after his wife leaves in a panic. He decides to take a road trip to reunite with his high school sweetheart. Accompanying him is a neighbor who inadvertently puts a wrench in his plan.

name: The Last Station
tagline: A historical drama that illustrates Russian author Leo Tolstoy's struggle to balance fame and wealth with his commitment to a life devoid of material things.

name: The Savages
tagline: A sister and brother face the realities of familial responsibility as they begin to care for their ailing father.

name: Best of the Best 2
tagline: The Colosseum is the fighting arena owned by the champion Bracus. Now after the death of their friend, Rhee and Roberts want revenge.

name: Bride & Prejudice
tagline: Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice gets a Bollywood treatment.

name: The Razor's Edge
tagline: He had everything and wanted nothing. He learned that he had nothing and wanted everything. He saved the world and then it shattered. The path to enlightenment is as sharp and narrow as a razor's edge.

name: The Grandmaster
tagline: The story of martial-arts master Ip Man, the man who trained Bruce Lee.
